Efficient parallel correlation of traces¶

This module implements a suite of functions that allow

Time domain preprocessing¶

detrend Remove trend from data
TDnormalization Amplitude dependent time domain normalization
taper Taper to the time series data
clip Clip time series data at a multiple of the standard deviation
TDfilter Filter time series data
normalizeStandardDeviation Divide the time series by their standard deviation
signBitNormalization One bit normalization of time series data
zeroPadding Append zeros to the traces

Frequency domain preprocessing¶

spectralWhitening Spectal whitening of Fourier-transformed date
stream_pxcorr Preprocess and correlate traces in a stream
FDsignBitNormalization Sign bit normalization of frequency transformed data

Correlation¶

calc_cross_combis Calculate a list of all cross correlation combination of traces in the stream: i.e.
stream_pxcorr Preprocess and correlate traces in a stream
